attributes.action: Stop Bulk Bying at stores in time of crisis
attributes.additional_details: In the current crisis (pandemic) Supermarkets are being stripped bare by more able persons whilst vulnerable persons are left wanting
attributes.background: Legislate to stop bulk (panic) buying and make mass profiteering in time if crisis a crrimnal offence

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302823
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
